Name: VerticalStackLayout
Description: Vertical-only stack layout for arranging children.

Constructors.Description: Creates a VerticalStackLayout and sets spacing.
Creates a VerticalStackLayout with a component ref.
Creates a VStack with a component ref.
Creates a VStack and sets spacing.
Creates a VStack and adds child nodes.
Creates a VStack and adds child objects (auto-wrapped).
Creates a VStack with a component ref and adds child objects.
Creates a VStack, sets spacing, and adds child nodes.
Creates a VStack, sets spacing, and adds child objects.
Creates a VStack with component ref, sets spacing, and adds child objects.
